0.desc: Your data security is very important to us. Therefore, the login process consists of two parts. The recovery key helps you to secure your information. Please keep it inaccessible to third parties in a safe place.
0.title: Login to the evan.network

1.desc: Blockchain technology enables transparency of transactions by secure a non-personalized transparency. Any transaction could be seen by any member of the blockchain. Your privacy is saved by using decrypted addresses instead of plain names
1.title: Welcome to the evan.network

0.desc:
To participate in the evan.network, please create an account. The account type depends on your requirements.
  • Company - in order to be able to interact as a trustworthy company.
  • User - to interact as a real person. This account type offers the possibility to adapt to your requirements (e.g. company) at a later time.
0.title: Registration in the evan.network

1.desc: To make transactions in the evan.network, you need an account. On the basis of your company-specific data, you can be verified later as a trustful company.
1.title: Your path to a company account

2.desc: You need your address data later for the verification as a company. This creates a network of partners exchanging data and information directly across companies.
2.title: Your path to a company account

3.desc: After completing the registration, you have access to the evan.network and can interact trustfully with your partners.
3.title: Welcome to the evan.network

0.desc:
To participate in the evan.network, please create an account. The account type depends on your requirements.
  • Company - in order to be able to interact as a trustworthy company.
  • User - to interact as a real person. This account type offers the possibility to adapt to your requirements (e.g. company) at a later time.
0.title: Registration in the evan.network

1.desc: After completing the registration, you have access to the evan.network and can interact trustfully with your partners
1.title: Welcome to the evan.network

0.desc: Digital twins are the key to make transactions in the evan.network. Enter here the basic data of your digital twin, so that you can exchange information with business partners.
0.title: Your gateway to digital twins

1.desc: Each digital twin is unique. Only you decide which information is shared confidentially with your business partners. Enter here the specifications of your digital twin, regarding to your requirements.
1.title: Data sovereignty has top priority

2.desc: The digital twin enables you to connect with your business partners. You decide when your business partners have access to the digital twin and its stored information. This guarantees your data sovereignty.
2.title: Add rights and roles for information

3.desc: In order to use the digital twin, you need to register free of charge in the evan.network. The blockchain technology enables trustful interactions in the network. Your data sovereignty is guaranteed.
3.title: Welcome to the evan.network

_onboarding.invalid-mnemonic-integrity: The composition of the words in your recovery key is incorrect. Please check your input.
_onboarding.invalid-mnemonic-words-incorrect: One or more of the given words is not allowed in recovery keys. Please check your input.

mail-invitation-accepted.body:
Hello,
the user with the email address {userEmail} accepted your invitation to the evan.network and is now available under that name: {userAlias}.

Your evan.network Team
mail-invitation-accepted.subject: User has accepted your request
mail-invitation-accepted.title: Invitation accepted

_onboarding.password-match-repeat: Your password must match the second entry.
_onboarding.password-min-characters: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
_onboarding.password-one-character: Your password must contain at least one letter.
_onboarding.password-one-digest-needed: Your password must contain at least one number.
_onboarding.password-one-uppercase-character: Your password must contain at least one capital letter.
_onboarding.please-login-signup: Use an existing identity or create a new one to continue.

sign-in.desc: Restore an existing evan.network identity on this device
sign-in.get-mnemonic-desc: Insert your recovery key to restore your evan.network identity or paste it from your clipboard.
sign-in.get-password-desc: Enter your password to access the data of your identity.
sign-in.no-profile-desc: There is no evan.network identity associated with this recovery key.
sign-in.title: Log in
sign-in.welcome-desc: You have received a contact request.

alias.hint: The account name is only visible to you.
alias.label: Account name

create-profile.long: All data for the creation of your evan.network identity has been recorded. Please confirm the terms of use via captcha query to complete the process.
create-profile.title: Create Account

sign-up.desc-long: Generate your secure and independent identity on the evan.network. With the help of this identity, you can interact with business partners, contracts and companies. You can restore your identity on another device at any time using your generated recovery key and continue working.

errors.password-match-repeat: Your password must match the previous one!
errors.password-min-characters: Your password must be at least 8 characters long!
errors.password-one-character: Your password must contain at least one letter!
errors.password-one-digest-needed: Your password must contain at least one number!
errors.password-one-uppercase-character: Your password must contain at least one capital letter!

sign-up.get-mnemonic-desc-long:
Using this recovery key, you can restore your identity on any device and access your data. Please save these 12 words in a secure way (preferably offline, e.g. on a piece of paper).

If you lose these 12 words, you will lose access to your business partners, contracts and profile information.

password0.hint: The password must consist of at least 8 characters (upper/lower case and numbers).
password0.label: Password

password1.hint: The password must consist of at least 8 characters (upper/lower case and numbers).
password1.label: Retype password

profile-create-error.desc: An error occurred during profile creation. Please try again.
profile-create-error.title: Error

sign-up.profile-information-desc: Please define an account name and a password.

base.desc: Select user type and specify your account name and password.
base.title: User information

captcha.desc: Please confirm that you are not acting as automatic software and accept our terms of use.
captcha.title: Terms of use

contact.desc: Specify organization location and contact information.
contact.title: Contact information

registration.desc: Specify company name and registration information. If you have not all the data directly, you can also fill it later.
registration.title: Company information

sign-up.terms-accepted: I agree with the Terms of Use.
sign-up.title: Sign up

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: What should the Digital Twin be called?

dbcp.desc: Choose a type and give your Digital Twin a name.
dbcp.title: Basic information

finish.desc: For your access to your Digital Twin, we need an alias and a password.
finish.title: User information

metadata.desc: Describe your Digital Twin by its specifications
metadata.title: Twin specifications

sign-up.welcome-desc: You have received a contact request.

signed-in.invited:
Welcome to the evan.network {alias} ({accountId}).

You were invited by {inviteeAlias} to the evan.network. If you add this contact to your address book, you will receive {eveAmount} EVE as an invitation gift.
signed-in.title: evan.network log in
signed-in.unlock-for-accept:
You are already signed in to the evan.network.

You have received a contact request from {inviteeAlias}. Unlock your profile to continue or use the back button, to log in with an other identity.
signed-in.welcome-signed-in:
You are already signed in to the evan.network ({accountId}).

Use the following button to start your work.
signed-in.welcome-unlocked:
Welcome to the evan.network {alias} ({accountId}).

You can now start your work.
